column4: i tried to run klavaro from the terminal and i got this error:  *** glibc detected *** klavaro: double free or corruption (fasttop): 0x094c89a0 *** what is this?
does anybody know what this error means?    *** glibc detected *** klavaro: double free or corruption (fasttop): 0x094c89a0 ***
how did you install klavaro?
sudo apt-get install klavaro
strange -- and how did you try to start it? GUI or CLI ?
cli
let me try it
ill post some of the error log
here it starts flawlessly - did you try to call klavaro_helper?
http://paste.ubuntu.com/398472/
http://paste.ubuntu.com/398472/
sorry - that doesn't tell *me* anything - I suggest you ask the developper if he knows what could cause it
thanks anyway
Good luck :-)   and thanks for telling me about klavaro
was that a buffer overlow?
np
no, it was a "double free" - menaning that apparently the same memory got released twice
ok ill research it thx
its not a sercurity issue is it?
best ask the developper directly - are you on 32 bit or 64bit ?
not as far as I can see -- ah that could make a difference - I'm on 64 bit
